ActorTalk: After traveling down so many paths, it's only natural to worry about getting lost someday.
Not knowing where to find you, Commandant... that's the ending I refuse to accept.
But you've found an answer now, haven't you?
Yes. It's something you helped me see, Commandant.
Time and space can't be trusted. Anything around us can change without warning.
But between us, between two hearts that still carry warmth, there has to be something that won't change.
As long as I'm here on this side of the road, and you're still there on the other, I won't lose my way.
In the end... I'll always find you.
And I'll always keep walking toward you, too.
Our vows, our markers, you and me—none of that will ever change, right?
Maybe the cycle isn't over yet. Maybe we'll forget something again next time—
But this Dreamweaver world we created together will last forever.
I used to rely on markers to help me find my way, but what if those markers change, or disappear?
Even if we forget, we'll remember again one day. Even if we're apart, we'll still find our way back to each other.
Right. It has nothing to do with the road ahead. It comes from us. As long as we never let go of each other's hands, our bond will never fade.
And that's exactly what we're doing now.
